mapper.insert: INSERT INTO penetr_check ( userName, phone, terminalName, terminalType, APPID, counter, currdate ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{phone}, #{terminalName}, #{terminalType}, #{APPID}, #{counter}, #{currdate} )
